participant_2.background:
I am feeling lost and confused about my future.
i am a gourmet cook.
I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.
I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger.
I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.

content.text: I am good! A bit lost, but good. How about you?
I am doing well, just working on a new project. What are you working on?
I am trying to figure out my future. I feel lost and confused.
Oh, I am sorry to hear that. What do you need help with?
I don't know where to start. I am not sure what I want to do with my life.
Well, what do you like to do?
I love to cook, and I am a good cook. I also love to watch TV.
Have you thought about becoming a chef?
I have, but I am not sure if I have the right skills.
You could always take some classes to learn more.
That is a good idea. I will look into it.
Also, you could always start a cooking blog.
That is a great idea! I love to write, too.
There you go! You have a few things to think about.
Thanks for the help! I really appreciate it.
No problem! I am always happy to help.
